name: ENROLL_STAT_CHNG
description: This table contains the enrollment status change of a participant in a research study and the effective date of the status change.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the enrollment record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHNG_ENROLL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The enrollment status category ID for a status change in an enrollment record.

columns.name: ENROLL_STAT_CHNG_DATE
columns.description: The date when an enrollment status became effective for an enrollment.
